job_description:
Must Haves

Hands-on experience with MS.NET/.NET Core/C#, Multithreading/Deadlock/Threads/Tasks/Event, Real-time/SignalR, asynchronous programming

Experience with MS Azure, MS .NET Core Services/Web API/OpenAPI/Swagger, Microservices, Docker/Containers/ Kubernetes/AKS, Design Patterns/DDD/CQRS

Actively participating in architecture solution design and recommendations focused on the Web Service/Web API/microservices/back-end layer

Develop Best Practices and help implement them as well.
